values: Sacrifice Tenacious Dead to Ashnod's Altar, generating :mana2:. Pitiless Plunderer, Blood Artist, and Tenacious Dead trigger; stack the triggers to resolve in that order. Pitiless Plunderer generates a Treasure token; crack it to float :manab:. Blood Artist drains each opponent for 1. Resolve the Tenacious Dead trigger, paying :mana1::manab: to return it to the battlefield from the graveyard. Repeat the sacrifice-recursion loop draining opponents infinitely with Blood Artist triggers.
Infinite lifegain. Infinite life drain to opponents. Infinite ETB. Infinite death triggers. Infinite LTB. Infinite mill.

Sacrifice Tenacious Dead to Phyrexian Altar, generating :mana1: of any color. Pitiless Plunderer, Blood Artist, and Tenacious Dead trigger; stack the triggers to resolve in that order. Pitiless Plunderer generates a Treasure token; crack it to float :manab:. Blood Artist drains each opponent for 1. Resolve the Tenacious Dead trigger, paying :mana1::manab: to return it to the battlefield from the graveyard. Repeat the sacrifice-recursion loop, draining opponents infinitely with Blood Artist triggers.
Infinite lifegain. Infinite life drain to opponents. Infinite ETB. Infinite death triggers. Infinite LTB.
All named permanents on the battlefield. Any other two creatures (at least one nontoken) on the battlefield, and any creature card in the graveyard.

Activate Whisper, Blood Liturgist; sacrifice the two other creatures and targeting any creature in the graveyard for reanimation. When the creatures are sacrificed, Thornbite Staff and Pawn of Ulamog trigger. Resolve Thornbite Staff's trigger, untapping Whisper. Resolve Pawn of Ulamog's trigger, creating at least one Eldrazi Spawn token. Resolve Whisper's activated ability, reanimating the creature. Repeatedly activate Whisper, sacrificing the newly reanimated creature and newly generated Eldrazi Spawn token to reanimate a different creature and creating another Eldrazi Spawn each time. Whenever Whisper is activated, Blood Artist triggers twice, draining opponents for 2.
Infinite lifegain. Infinite life drain to opponents. Infinite ETB. Infinite LTB. Infinite death triggers.
Both permanents on the battlefield. A way to gain life, or cause opponents' life loss.

Any lifegain will trigger Epicure of Blood, causing opponents' life loss. Any life loss of opponents will trigger Exquisite Blood, causing life gain. The two effects will feed back into each other, causing Infinite life drain to opponents.
Infinite lifegain. Infinite life drain to opponents.
All permanents on the battlefield. Attacked with any creature this turn.

Sacrifice Bloodsoaked Champion to Altar of Dementia, milling target opponent for 2. Pawn of Ulamog, Pitiless Plunderer, and Blood Artist trigger. Pawn of Ulamog generates an Eldrazi Spawn token; sacrifice it to float :mana1: (Pitiless Plunderer and Blood Artist trigger again). Resolve two Pitiless Plunderer triggers, generating two Treasure tokens; crack one to float :manab:. Resolve two Blood Artist triggers, draining opponents for 2. Activate Bloodsoaked Champion for :mana1::manab:, returning it to the battlefield from the graveyard. Repeat the sacrifice-recursion loop, gaining one Treasure token per loop and draining opponents infinitely with Blood Artist triggers.
Infinite mill. Infinite lifegain. Infinite life drain to opponents. Infinite ETB. Infinite death triggers. Infinite colored mana. Infinite LTB.
All permanents on the battlefield. Attacked with any creature this turn.

Activate Sensei's Divining Top; draw a card and put it on top of your library. Cast Sensei's Top from your library using Bolas's Citadel, paying 1 life. Aetherflux Reservoir triggers on cast, gaining life. Repeat the loop of casting Top for 1 life and activating it, drawing your library and gaining more life with each Top cast. Cast your win conditions from the top of library using Bolas's Citadel and the life gained from the Aetherflux-Top storm.
Draw your entire library, casting many of those cards for free.

Saffi on the battlefield or graveyard. Champion in hand.

With Saffi in play or in the graveyard we cast Crypt Champion without paying a red mana. When The Champion comes into play, we stack the triggers so that the reanimation effect resolves first. If Saffi is in the graveyard, we'll bring her back with the reanimation effect, if she's already in play we can have it fizzle. The Champion's second ability will then trigger, forcing us to sacrifice him because we didn't pay the red mana. In response we will sacrifice Saffi to her ability, targeting the Champion. The Champion dies and is immediatly brought back by Saffi's ability. We again stack the triggers so the reanimation effect resolves first and with it reanimate Saffi. Since we reanimated him and didn't pay a red mana to cast him, his second ability forces us to sacrifice him again. You can keep looping this for however long you want and simply stop it by not sacrificing Saffi to bring him back

Every 5 additional treasures allows you to untap Folio with Clock of Omens, then mill again. 4 additional treasures allows you to untap Folio with Clock of Omen, then activate its first ability to draw 1.

Resolve the extra turns triggers, sacrificing no permanents as both Invocation and Mirror are new objects. Repeat for infinite turns.
